name: Cod BeH-30
description:
In Code BeH-30, avenge your city and engage in a fight against a diabolic, mutant, robotic fortress in this 360, fast-paced tank bullet-hell game.

You use the left and right arrow keys to move the tank 360 degrees around the enemy, aiming always to the middle of the screen. There are weak points on the surface of the enemy.

This game was created in two weeks as part of the Game Design and Development II course at Michigan State University,  spring 2020.

The team:

  • Gonzalo Andrés Barrera Rivera: Designer and Developer.
  • Andy Zhang: Artist.
  • Jerry Cortez: Sound Designer.
